physicalDescription.extent: 1 item photograph, 10 x 44 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Printed on the front of the photograph: ''Bell Tailors' Annual Picnic, - Bergen Park, - Monday, July 18, 1927.'' On the back of the photograph: ''#1005A (oversize), Bell Tailors 1927.''

mods.abstract: Bell Tailors' employees and their families picnic in Bergen Park in the Colorado mountains on July 18, 1927. People are holding three signs: ''Bell Tailors Annual Picnic, Bergen Park.'' There are five open-sided tour buses and some of the people are standing on top of one of the buses.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
